name: spliton
description: Split expenses app with frontend and backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
